name: MSDN My Way: A couple of changes
description:
The new MSDN Library looks a lot better than the previous one. I just felt urged to tweak some things even more. You may disagree with my changes, and if so, comment this style. Purpose is to make t more readable and make sections more clear.

Changes:

16. mars 2007: * Added a couple !important -statements to make sure it overrides styles correctly.
